duck: The Wombles - The Wombles are fictional pointy-nosed, furry creatures that live in burrows, where they aim to help the environment by collecting and recycling rubbish in creative ways.
n a city in central Russia: formerly an important gold-mining town and administrative centre for a large area of Siberia; university ; engineering industries.
Tomsk is a city and the administrative center of Tomsk Oblast, Russia, located on the Tom River.

Akademgorodok in Tomsk - Tomsk Akademgorodok is an estate in the Soviet area of Tomsk, Siberian Federal District, in which are research institutes, and have employees of the Tomsk Scientific Center Siberian Branch of Ru...

|website_ref= |commonscat=Tomsk |date=May 2010 }} 'Tomsk' () is a city and the
administrative center of Tomsk Oblast, Russia, located on the Tom River. One of
the oldest towns in Siberia, Tomsk celebrated its 400th anniversary in 2004.
